New Records: Gous-Harmeet put on 91, the second highest partnership for the sixth-wicket in all T20Is
Key Match Events: Quinton de Kock scored 74, his highest score of the T20 World Cup
Kagiso Rabada struck first, dismissing Steven Taylor
Corey Anderson took a skier to dismiss Reeza Hendricks
Tabraiz Shamsi bowled out and had figures of 1 for 24
Keshav Maharaj bowled out and had figures of 1 for 24
Shayan Jahangir prevented what should have been South Africa's first boundary
Reeza Hendricks finally got a boundary when he hit the last ball of the second over over cover for six
Monank Patel has not recovered from his shoulder injury to captain USA, so Aaron Jones will stand in for him
South Africa posted the highest score in Antigua - 194
Pre-Game Insights: Aiden Markram said he would have bowled first too but also wasn't sure exactly what to do
South Africa have gone in with two spinners which means Ottneil Baartman, who was talked up less than 15 minutes ago on this blog, has been left out
The USA players sweat it out ahead of their Super Eight fixture against South Africa
Aiden Markram was South Africa's under-19 captain when they won the age-group World Cup 10 years ago
Post-Match Reflections: USA came really close, closer than the margin may suggest, and did not disgrace themselves at all
The game was lost with ball in hand with five USA bowlers conceding 148 runs in 12 overs and not building on the work of the other two
Miscellaneous Highlights: USA are punching much above their weight in this World Cup
They've imposed themselves on a much-daunted middle-order and this was the result of the last few overs
South Africa's previous highest PP score at the tournament was 38 against Nepal
They've done far better than that this time and it was largely thanks to this 28-run over from Jessy Singh that included a no-ball six!
